content.html: Today's important soft skill - hearing about a technical issue and being able to identify the difference between being able to fix it, needing to fix it, and it needing to be fixed by the team discussing it A hard one when your team's gut reaction is so often "fix it now, fast!"
content.value:
Today's important soft skill - hearing about a technical issue and being able to identify the difference between being able to fix it, needing to fix it, and it needing to be fixed by the team discussing it

A hard one when your team's gut reaction is so often "fix it now, fast!"
